featured.text: One day, she dusted off the story she had written for the writers’ group and decided to make it into a novel.
Chinese writer Lu Yu wrote in A.D. 780 that there were “tens of thousands” of teas.
But Dumas overcame poverty, the lack of formal education, and the hardship of racism to become one of the world’s most popular writers.
She wanted to be a professional writer.
Mr. Lin is a very ________ writer; he publishes at least five novels every year.

other.text: What is the writer’s main purpose for writing this passage? (A)
For a temporary escape, she joined a small writers’ group, in which each member was required to bring a story or poem for discussion.
The life of black people in the U.S. (B) The life of an African American writer.
They are attracted by the American writer’s 21 of the millennia-old glaciers.
Why did Morrison join the writers’ group?

definition.en_def: A person who writes, especially as an occupation or profession.
definition.example: The writer published her first novel last year.
